channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:08 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:08 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
